entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 6:00 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: ENE 35 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
